*****************
API Documentation
*****************

This section documents the Application Programming Interface for this project.

.. NOTE::

   For the sake of brevity, the common parent packages of :mod:`everyapp` and
   :mod:`everyapp.bootstrap` are sometimes shortened to ``E`` and ``E.B``
   respectively.
